title: Shape
description: Choose a shape to draw: line, circle/ellipse, rectangle, or triangle.

title: Character Name
description: Edit the name of the character.

title: Cut
description: After selecting the Cut tool, you can tap a character or shape to remove it from the canvas.

title: Duplicate
description: After selecting the Duplicate tool, you can tap a character or shape to create a copy of it.

title: Rotate
description: After selecting the Rotate tool, you can rotate a character or shape around its center.

title: Drag
description: After selecting the Drag tool, you can drag a character or shape on the canvas. If you tap on a shape, you can then edit the shape by dragging the dots that appear.

title: Save
description: Save changes and leave the Paint Editor.

title: Fill
description: After selecting the Fill tool, you can tap any section of a character or shape to fill it with the currently selected color.

title: Camera
description: After selecting the Camera tool, you can tap any section of a character or shape, and then tap the camera button to fill the section with a new photo taken with the camera.

title: Color
description: Select a new color to use for drawing and filling in shapes.

title: Line Width
description: Change the width of the lines in the shapes you are drawing.
